title: NIT Manipur Recruitment 2025 - Apply for Junior Research Fellow Post
description: The National Institute of Technology Manipur (NIT Manipur) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Junior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech., M.E/ M.Tech in Mechanical Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the NIT Manipur Recruitment 2025 . Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application. Here we mentioned the age limit, selection Process, salary structure, educati...
